pullrequest.title: Make non-editable background models white in model editor

content.raw:
ah thanks for catching that. 

Looks like I don't need to MOC that header file since it's not using qt signals and slots and we're not installing it so I just removed it from CMakeLists.txt. 79db9fc. 

jenkins queued
content.html:
ah thanks for catching that.

Looks like I don't need to MOC that header file since it's not using qt signals and slots and we're not installing it so I just removed it from CMakeLists.txt. 79db9fc.

jenkins queued

content.html: Some models didn't change color when I entered the editor (soccer field and plastic cup)

pullrequest.title: Make non-editable background models white in model editor

content.raw:
made changes to turn planes other than the ground plane white. ce8f661

plastic cup uses `Gazebo/GreyTransparent` material, and it looks like it is not working properly in general. It should be transparent in simulation mode, not dark grey, will ticket an issue for this
content.html:
made changes to turn planes other than the ground plane white. ce8f661

plastic cup uses Gazebo/GreyTransparent material, and it looks like it is not working properly in general. It should be transparent in simulation mode, not dark grey, will ticket an issue for this

content.raw:
after discussion with @spaepcke, we decided to make all planes grey. 8856403
